price: 41. Y no es la palabra de un poeta, poco es lo que creéis;
arabic: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوۡلِ شَاعِرٖۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wamā huwa biqawli shāʿirin qalīlan mā tu'minūna
